channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tesla’s energy storage business is growing faster than any other part of the company
item.description: Energy storage products like the Megapack, Megablock, and Powerwall drove

item.title: Amazon is reportedly in talks to invest $50 billion in OpenAI
item.description: If a deal materializes, it would mean Amazon is backing competing startups in the race for AI supremacy.

item.title: Satya Nadella insists people are using Microsoft’s Copilot AI a lot
item.description: With Microsoft spending many billions on data centers, and rumors that no one is using its AI, CEO Satya Nadella shared some usage numbers.

item.title: Medium gives employees Friday off to participate in national strike protesting ICE
item.description: Activists behind the general strike are calling for "no work, no school, and no shopping" amid a push to defund ICE, which has escalated raids in U.S....

item.title: Fintech firm Marquis blames hack at firewall provider SonicWall for its data breach
item.description: The fintech giant said it plans to "seek recoupment of any expenses" from its firewall provider SonicWall after a 2025 data breach exposed customer fi...

item.title: Spotify rolls out group chats
item.description: Spotify users can now share the podcasts, playlists, and audiobooks they're listening to with up 10 people.

item.title: Microsoft won’t stop buying AI chips from Nvidia, AMD, even after launching its own, Nadella says
item.description: Microsoft says its own chip leapfrogs those made by other cloud providers like Amazon and Google. But it needs more.

item.title: Apple’s new iPhone and iPad security feature limits cell networks from collecting precise location data
item.description: The new security feature makes it more difficult for police and malicious hackers to obtain a person's precise location data from a cell phone company...

item.title: India is teaching Google how AI in education can scale
item.description: With the highest global usage of Gemini for learning, India is emerging as a key market shaping Google's approach to AI in education.

item.title: Flapping Airplanes and the promise of research-driven AI
item.description: A new AI lab called Flapping Airplanes launched yesterday, and a Sequoia partner has an interesting take on why they stand out.
